item.title: Serial Mode Communication
item.description: UART Points UART uses two wires - Tx & Rx Communication can be simplex, duplex or full-duplex Data is tranmsitted in frames.

item.title: ESP32 WROOM - NRND
item.description: And yet again, I decided to order components from AliExpress with the least hope of finding a working ESP32 by Espressif, but to my surprise it does work quiet well !

item.title: Logic Analyzer
item.description: Introduction: As an embedded engineer, a reliable logic analyzer is an essential tool for debugging and troubleshooting projects.
